title: Classic Disabled Referral Webhook Schema
description: Sent whenever a referral event happens and the classic program is disabled

referrer.title: Referrer User
referrer.description: The referrer user in who initiated this referral

referred.title: Referred User
referred.description: The referred user who initiated this referral

dateReferralStarted.title: Date Referral Started
dateReferralStarted.description: The date this referral was created

dateModified.title: Date Referral Modified
dateModified.description: The date this referral was last modified for any reason (e.g. converted, reward added, etc.)

dateUserModified.title: Date User Modified
dateUserModified.description: The date a user was added to or removed from the referral (e.g. removed as a result of user deletion)

programId.title: Program Id
programId.description: The Id of the program this code was created for

..\\UserIdentifier.schema.json.title: User Identifier Schema
..\\UserIdentifier.schema.json.description: The unique identifiers used to distinguish a user.

accountId.title: Account Id
accountId.description: The unique identifier of the account this user belongs to
